options.content: SESIM FINECT

targets.rawSql:
WITH logs AS (
  SELECT 
    is_attack,
    status_code,
    url
  FROM ai_results_1
  WHERE logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp($__from / 1000) AND to_timestamp($__to / 1000)
),
aggregates AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS total_requests,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_attack THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS attack_requests,
    SUM(CASE WHEN status_code BETWEEN 500 AND 599 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS error_5xx,
    SUM(CASE WHEN url ILIKE '%../%' OR url ILIKE '%admin%' OR url ILIKE '%.php%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS abnormal_paths
  FROM logs
),
scores AS (
  SELECT
    total_requests,
    attack_requests,
    error_5xx,
    abnormal_paths,
    attack_requests::float / NULLIF(total_requests, 0) AS attack_rate,
    CASE 
      WHEN total_requests = 0 THEN 100
      ELSE GREATEST(
        0,
        100
        - CASE 
            WHEN attack_requests::float / NULLIF(total_requests, 0) >= 0.2 THEN attack_requests::float / NULLIF(total_requests, 0) * 60
            ELSE attack_requests::float / NULLIF(total_requests, 0) * 30
          END
        - (error_5xx::float / total_requests) * 25
        - (abnormal_paths::float / total_requests) * 15
      )
    END AS score
  FROM aggregates
)
SELECT
  score AS "보안점수",
  CASE
    WHEN score >= 90 THEN '보안상태: 매우 양호' 
    WHEN score >= 70 THEN '보안상태: 약간 주의 필요' 
    WHEN score >= 50 THEN '보안상태: 경고' 
    WHEN score >= 30 THEN '보안상태:위험'
    ELSE '보안상태: 심각' 
  END AS "보안 상태"
FROM scores;

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "전체 로그"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "양호",
  attack_type,
  '보통' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score <= 0.3
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "주의",
  attack_type,
  '주의' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score > 0.3 AND attack_score < 0.5
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "경고",
  attack_type,
  '위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.5 AND attack_score < 0.7
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "위험",
  attack_type,
  '고위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.7 AND attack_score < 0.9
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM logged_at) AS time,
  attack_score AS "매우위험",
  attack_type,
  '매우위험' AS risk_level
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND attack_score >= 0.9
  AND attack_score IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY logged_at;

WITH current_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS "현재기간 공격횟수"
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
),
previous_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS "이전기간 공격횟수"
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND logged_at < to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
)
SELECT
    current_period."현재기간 공격횟수",
    previous_period."이전기간 공격횟수"
FROM current_period, previous_period;

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "이상행동 탐지수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "정상접근"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    is_attack = FALSE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "sql_injection"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'sql_injection'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "xss"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'xss'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "directory_traversal"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'directory_traversal'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "command_injection"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'command_injection'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "path_traversal"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'path_traversal'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

SELECT
    COUNT(*) AS "tls_probe"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
    attack_type = 'tls_probe'
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000);

WITH current_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS "현재 단위기간 공격횟수"
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
    AND logged_at <= to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
),
previous_period AS (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS "이전 단위기간 공격횟수"
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
    AND logged_at >= to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) - INTERVAL '1 day'
    AND logged_at < to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000)
)
SELECT
    current_period."현재 단위기간 공격횟수" AS "현재 단위기간 공격횟수",
    previous_period."이전 단위기간 공격횟수" AS "이전 단위기간 공격횟수",
    CASE
        WHEN previous_period."이전 단위기간 공격횟수" = 0 THEN NULL  -- 이전 기간에 공격이 없으면 증감률을 계산하지 않음
        ELSE
            (current_period."현재 단위기간 공격횟수" - previous_period."이전 단위기간 공격횟수") * 100.0 / previous_period."이전 단위기간 공격횟수"
    END AS "공격 증감률"
FROM current_period, previous_period;

SELECT client_ip, COUNT(*) AS "공격횟수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()  -- Grafana에서 시간 범위를 자동으로 설정
  AND is_attack = TRUE  -- 공격으로 표시된 로그만
GROUP BY client_ip
ORDER BY "공격횟수" DESC
LIMIT 10;  -- 상위 10개 IP만 표시

SELECT
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM date_trunc('minute', logged_at)) AS time,  -- 분 단위로 그룹화
  COUNT(*) AS "이상탐지"  -- 해당 분에 발생한 공격 로그 수
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND is_attack = TRUE  -- 공격인 경우만 필터링
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('minute', logged_at) AS log_minute,
    COUNT(*) AS "전체"
FROM ai_results_1
GROUP BY log_minute
ORDER BY log_minute;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('minute', logged_at) AS log_minute,
    COUNT(*) AS "이상탐지"
FROM ai_results_1 where is_attack
GROUP BY log_minute
ORDER BY log_minute;

SELECT 
  attack_type AS "공격 유형",
  COUNT(*) AS "공격 횟수"
FROM ai_results_1
WHERE 
  logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()
  AND is_attack = TRUE
GROUP BY attack_type
ORDER BY "공격 횟수" DESC;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "공격횟수" , url
FROM ai_results_1 
WHERE logged_at >= $__timeFrom() AND logged_at <= $__timeTo()  -- Grafana에서 시간 범위를 자동으로 설정
  AND is_attack = TRUE  -- 공격으로 표시된 로그만
GROUP BY url
ORDER BY "공격횟수" DESC
LIMIT 10;  -- 상위 10개 경로만 표시

panels.title: 가장 많이 공격 받은 경로 TOP 10

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    logged_at AS "시간",
    attack_score AS "공격 점수",
    is_attack AS "공격",
    attack_type AS "공격유형",
    client_ip AS "IP",
    url AS "경로"
FROM ai_results_1
ORDER BY logged_at DESC;

WITH top_attackers AS (
    SELECT client_ip
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) AND to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
    GROUP BY client_ip
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 3
),
attack_data AS (
    SELECT
        client_ip,
        url, 
        COUNT(*) AS cnt
    FROM ai_results_1
    WHERE is_attack = TRUE
      AND logged_at BETWEEN to_timestamp(${__from} / 1000) AND to_timestamp(${__to} / 1000)
      AND client_ip IN (SELECT client_ip FROM top_attackers)
    GROUP BY client_ip, url
)

SELECT 
    client_ip AS source,
    url AS target,
    cnt AS value
FROM attack_data
ORDER BY value DESC;
